title: Akira Kubota
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Kubota was born in <a href="Kyoto%20Prefecture">Kyoto Prefecture</a> on April 12, 1973. After graduating from high school, he joined <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> in 1992. Although he debuted in 1994, he could hardly play in the match. In 1995, he moved to his local club <a href="Kyoto%20Sanga%20FC">Kyoto Purple Sanga</a> in <a href="Japan%20Football%20League%20%281992%E2%80%9398%29">Japan Football League</a>. The club won the 2nd place in 1995 and was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a>. However he could not play at all in the match in 1996. In 1997, he moved to <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a> club <a href="Sagawa%20Shiga%20FC">Sagawa Express Osaka</a>. Although the club was promoted to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League">Japan Football League</a> from 2002 season, he retired end of 2001 season.
